events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund or exchange for a different size.
The reported issue has been categorized under refund and exchange requests based on customer message content.
The case has been assigned to agent Emma for handling the refund request regarding the jacket.
Hello! I understand you’d like a refund or exchange for the jacket you ordered. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed to proceed with the refund?
The order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and has not been worn or washed yet.
Thank you for the information. We can process a full refund for your order after you return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will send you.
That sounds great, thank you. Please send the shipping label as soon as possible.
The prepaid shipping label was emailed to you. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the shipping label and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and have sent the jacket back. Thank you for following up.
Your refund has been completed and the case is now closed. Please reach out if you need further help in the future.
